title: World Bank to Approve $500m Nigeria Loan for Agriculture
desc: The World Bank is set to approve a $500m loan to Nigeria to boost agricultural productivity, strengthen value chains, and create new jobs.

title: Unlocking Heavy Rare Earths: Cleaner Chemistry, Stronger Strategy
desc: Ion-adsorption rare earth ores supply most heavy REEs, but extraction faces chemical, geotechnical & environmental challenges demanding greener methods.

title: Blade slices over Sellier's eye in Olympic speedskating 1500
desc: Kamila Sellier of Poland was stretchered off after a blade sliced over her left eye during an accident at the women's 1,500 meters Friday, but Polish officials said her eye was OK.
